abstract: The OWL-Time ontology is an OWL-2 DL ontology [owl2-direct-semantics] of temporal concepts, for describing the temporal properties of resources in the world or described in Web pages. The ontology provides a vocabulary for expressing facts about topological relations among instants and intervals, together with information about durations, and about temporal position including date-time information.
